entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
